channel.title: Dayton Headlines Feed
channel.description: Daily top 3 headlines from Dayton, OH media

item.title: Ohio county agrees to $7M settlement over man’s death in jail restraint
item.description: The family of Christian Black, who died after being restrained by jail deputies in Montgomery County, reached a $7M settlement. Officials plan to expand mental health support in the jail as the family seeks accountability.

item.title: New video shows chaos after Dayton bar shooting, police neutralize gunman
item.description: A newly released video captures the immediate aftermath of a shooting at Ned Peppers in Dayton’s Oregon District. Police say they killed the shooter before he could enter the bar; at least 41 shell casings were found.
